item.description:
This is going to be a fun, interactive evening where facilitator (and your organizer) Monique Morimoto Flaherty will be doing a live coaching demo with The Colored Pencil Project. These women have graciously agreed to bring an organizational concern to the table and be coached around it.
As participants you will learn a process for taking a complex situation and simplifying it, contribute to this organization's solution and have fun. More details to follow! See you there!
item.name: This is a Live one!
